response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and value, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market rate, making it a highly attractive opportunity for you. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. Best regards, Alice", "product_price": 12000}
